scripts.check: bun run format && bun run lint
scripts.check:write: bun run format:write && bun run lint:write
scripts.deploy:preview: dotenvx run -f .env.preview -- bun run deploy.ts preview
scripts.deploy:staging: dotenvx run -f .env.staging -- bun run deploy.ts staging
scripts.deploy:production: dotenvx run -f .env.production -- bun run deploy.ts production
